name: Roger (Coussi)
description:
Submission for the Mix and Game Jam 2020.

This is my first game jam and first game. So of course it is more of a prototype but hope you will like it!

All comments are welcome, thanks!

Credits: The Kart model come from: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/stylized-kart-free-download-db4f1acb9d86413bafca...
